31.22: Commander, the truth is... I.. had... fun...
31.Anniversary 6547: Woah, the third anniversary is here? Amazing, unbelieveable. Ah, well, nap time I guess?
31.Rainy 6547: I'm sleepy.... Rainy season, huh... The sound of rain is really lulling.... Commander, let's sleep.... zzZZzzz...
31.EarlySummer 6547: Ahh~... It's getting a bit hot~ I'm feeling sluggish... isn't there any ice cream~? Ice cream...
31.Summer 6547: *sigh* It's seriously hot. It's no good... no good... Ramune's all gone... ice cream all gone... no good at all!
31.NotFall 6547: It's fall~ Time for the fall harvest~ There's gonna be so much yummy stuff~ I just want to eat and sleep~
31.6547: Well we have a lot of time, so let's go do Operation F. I guess I can fish up dinner in this downtime.

99.1: Kumaa. Nice to meet you, kuma.
99.25: First ship of the Kuma-class light cruisers, Kuma kuma. Born in Sasebo kuma. I got some old parts, but I'll try my best, kumaa.
99.4: Don't pat me, kuma. I'm not a teddy bear, kuma~
99.29: Ku~…ma~… it, it's not like I'm bored, Kuma. I'm enjoying this fully, Kuma!
99.28: Admiral, thanks for you hard work kuma. Taking a break from time-to-time is good, kuma.
99.24: Fufufu~ I've caught the admiral, kuma. I'm not gonna let you go, kuma. Kumakuma~!
99.12: I almost thought I was going to die there, kuma~!
99.5: A new ship has been made, kuma~.
99.7: Mission complete. Do you want to see the report, kuma?
99.14: Choosing Kuma is a good choice, kuma.
99.23: I'm often told that I am an unexpectedly excellent Kuma-chan, kuma.
99.21: For Kuma to be damaged to this point... what a disgrace, kuma...
99.22: Kuma did what she could, but... this is the end kuma....
99.Anniversary 6547: It's the bearry unexpected third anniversary. I can't bearlieve it, But it bears a celebration! Ku-ma~!
99.Rainy 6547: I hate the rainy season, kuma. Kuuuumaaaa... kuuuumaaaa... Aah! I hate the rain, kuma. Kuuuumaaaa...
99.Summer 6547: It's summer! I'm going swimming, kumaaa. Watch Kuma's river-swimming technique, kuma. I'll paw up some salmon too, kuma~. Ah... that was a joke, kuma.

87.1: You're the admiral? I see. Anyway, second ship of the Ise class— Hyuuga. Remember me, if you would.
87.25: Second of the Ise-class battleships, Hyuuga. Ah yes, I became an aviation battleship together with Ise you know. That's originally because an accident happened on my fifth turret. I'm fighting till I am sunk at Kure.
87.2: Hey... aren't you... Oh, it's you, Admiral.
87.4: I wonder what we're fighting for.
87.24: Admiral, what's with that face... you're getting all hot, too. Are you sick? Shall we lie down together?
87.8: Contact is here. Read or not read, that's up to you.
87.9: This enhancement, I wonder how it will influence our strength...
87.26: Um, not bad... not necessarily good either though.
87.27: Such invigoration... I wonder how will it effect my performance.
87.11: I like to rest when we can.
87.12: Well, I'll leave the front line to Ise.
87.6: The repairs of the ship seem to be finished.
87.5: There's a newcomer to our fleet... what an eccentric ship.
87.7: The fleet is back. Things will get busy...
87.16: A close shot... I'll hit it with the next one.
87.18: Well, might as well bring it down now...
87.17: Why is the enemy fleet attacking us...?
87.23: My attack was effective?... I see, it's not a bad feeling, not that it means much.
87.20: Hey hey...! Why the fifth turret?
87.21: Well... A little bit breezy thanks to that... I guess...
87.22: Might as well take a look at the afterlife... Ise, this was a short farewell...
87.Anniversary 6547: Oh? So, it's an anniversary today.... Looks like everybody is happy. Well, that's not too bad.
87.Rainy 6547: It rains often at this time of year. It'll be a problem if this affects the Zuiuns' operations....
87.Summer 6547: I don't have a problem with this season. Ise... Ise? Ah, are you sleeping?

100.1: Light cruiser, Tama. I'm not a cat, nya.
100.25: Second of the Kuma-class light cruisers, Tama nya. I did my duty as a torpedo squadron flagship, nya! Nya? Tama's my name, but I'm not a cat!
100.3: Ha! Without thinking, my hand... stop teasing me~!
100.28: Thanks for the hard work, nya. Take a break with Tama, nya. Nyaa~
100.24: Admiral, please stop calling me with chan at the end, nya. It sort of... feels different, nya.
100.8: Letter addressed to the admiral, nya.
100.9: This is fine, nya. Nyo problem.
100.27: This is fine, nya. Nyo problem.
100.12: In the dock, Tama will curl up, nyan.
100.5: A new ship has finished constructing, nya.
100.7: Looks like the fleet's returned, nya.
100.14: You want to borrow Tama's hand? It can't be helped, nyaa!
100.23: Tama's excellence? Nya~, that's just my high hunter's instincts... nya.

100.Rainy 6547: On rainy days, I just want to curl up in the room, nya. Kind of sleepy, nya. Good night, nya.
100.Summer 6547: It's summer, nyaaa. It's a little hot, nya. It's so hot it makes me wanna roll over onto my back and sleep, nya. Nyaa~

101.1: It's Kiso. I'll bestow upon you absolute victory.
101.25: 5500 ton Kuma-class light cruiser, Kiso. My regards. Runways and catapults... forget it. Don't need 'em. Battle is all about bringing it up close and personal. Right?!
101.4: Now you're talkin'. Skinship is important.
101.29: Someday, together with you... No, nothing. It's so unlike me too. Heh.

101.13: Where's the fool who dares challenge me?
101.9: Seaplanes? Don't need that sort of thing.
101.27: Seaplanes? Don't need that sort of thing.
101.5: Looks like a new ship is ready to go.
101.14: I'll teach them the meaning of a real battle.
101.18: Did you really think you could get away?
101.17: That's one incompetent commander you got there!
101.23: An inevitable result. No need to make a fuss about it.
101.21: Well then, I guess I've got some ventilation.
101.22: To have been able to sink me... be proud of yourself.
101.Anniversary 6547: So it has been three years... It looks like we've known each other for so long. No, It's not a bad thing.
101.Rainy 6547: The rainy season makes the wounds on my body ache... Telling me, "Faster. Go faster."... Nah, don't mind me.
101.Summer 6547: Summer, huh? Well, this season isn't too bad. You planning to go to the sea? Well?

21.1: Light Cruiser Nagara! Please take good care of me!
21.25: Weighing in as a 5500 ton light cruiser, first ship of the Nagara-class, Nagara! I'm a bit of an old model, but I'm a high-speed torpedo-armed team-leading machine, so I'm just perfect to command destroyers, you know? I even fought hard in the difficult Battle of the Solomons!
21.2: Commander, thanks for the hard work!
21.3: Done my miles for the day!
21.4: The commander is interested too? I've been working on my legs recently...
21.24: Thank you for always leading us to victory! Nagara also loves the commander!
21.13: It's time! Leave it to me!
21.10: Mhm! My body is light. Thank You!
21.6: Looks like the repair is complete.
21.7: The operation's over, the fleet's back.
21.14: Torpedo squadron, sortieing! I'm itching for a fight!
21.15: Enemy ship spotted! Ready for surface action!
21.18: Pursuing! I won't give you a gap to break through!
21.17: Can you keep up with Nagara's legs?
21.23: V-I-C-T-O-R-Y! Vic~to~ry! The sound of success!
21.21: If I had only trained more... Dammit!!
21.22: I wanted to run with everyone some more...

22.1: I'm Isuzu. Leave the torpedo squadrons to me. I'll bring victory to the admiral with all my power. Pleased to meet you.
22.25: Isuzu was built in the Taisho period (1912-1926) as the second of the Nagara Class light cruisers. As you might expect my speed is top-rate; the admirals that commanded me in history include Admiral Yamamoto Isoroku, Admiral Yamaguchi Tamon, and many other pillars of the Navy. Amazing, huh?
22.4: Huh? I got distracted. What was it you wanted?
22.29: I-It's not like I'm bored! I'm not! Okay!?
22.28: Idiot, don't worry so much. It's fine to take a break.
22.24: The admirals I've had as my partners have all had great success. Isoroku, Tamon... I wonder what will become of you? I'm looking forward to it.
22.8: There's a report for you. Read it well.
22.9: That modernization... saved me. Now I can work harder!
22.10: Heheh, that'll do. Now I'm more ready to fight!
22.27: Heheh, that'll do. Now I'm more ready to fight!
22.11: To be my best again, I'll have to go for a little.
22.12: It's okay, if I rest a little, one way or another I'll be better.
22.6: A ship has been fully repaired.
22.7: It seems the fleet has returned to base.
22.14: Admiral Yamamoto and Admiral Yamaguchi were my captains, you know!
22.18: A pursuit battle is Isuzu's speciality!
22.17: Idiot, do you want me to shoot you?
22.23: Huh? Isuzu is No.1? Well, that's what you'd normally expect. Ain't it good?
22.21: It's only the equipment on the surface that's damaged at most. The engines are still fine!
22.22: I overdid it slightly, huh...? Nagara, Natori, be well...

53.1: I'm called Natori... I'll do my best not to trouble you!
53.25: Third ship of the Nagara-class, Natori. I'm a bit of an older model, but there is much use for a high-speed light cruiser too... Y-yes, a Destroyer squadron, it'd be best if I was assigned to one, please. I-I'll do my best!
53.4: T-this... this is 'psyching up', isnt it.... Do your best..! Everybody!
53.28: Yeah! Then... that's all from me...
53.24: The admiral doesn't really like fighting as well, it makes me feel at ease. For the admiral, no, for y-you… I'll keep doing my best.
53.13: You called for me... Eh!? Sortie!?
53.10: Modernization... sorry! Even though I'm old...
53.26: Yeah! Then... that's all from me...
53.12: It's going to take a while to recover...
53.6: The repair is complete. And, that's all...
53.5: A new friend... well... that's all from me...
53.7: The operation is complete and the fleet has returned. Then... that's all from me...
53.15: E-enemy spotted... wait, it's a real battle!?
53.18: Night battle.... I'm good at them but... I...
53.17: Surface action... it'll be okay... I've practiced for this...
53.23: Eh!? I was the one who did the best...!? You're going to praise me...? Thank you...
53.20: Hieeeee! I-I'm on fire? Help meeeee!
53.21: Everyone... where did you all go...? *cries*
53.22: I've sunk a lot of ships already... I guess... this would have happened sooner or later...

23.1: Fourth ship of the Nagara-class Light Cruisers, 'Yura'. Pleased to make your acquaintance!
23.25: I'm Yura, the fourth ship of the Nagara-type Light Cruisers. I was the first out of all of us to be equipped with seaplanes. I've served as the flagship of torpedo and submarine squadrons. I'm not so good with Dauntless and B17 planes.
23.4: Admiral, do you really like my single barrel guns so much?
23.24: Admiral, how was my recon? As a light cruiser, I wanted to try doing it once…
23.13: Nagara-class Light Cruiser, Yura, heading out.
23.9: That's right, my firepower will become stronger, right?
23.10: Is my catapult... in the way?
23.27: Oh yeah, I've strengthen my firepower. Nice work!
23.5: They say a new ship has been completed.
23.7: Seems like the fleet has returned. I wonder if they achieved any results?
23.14: Now, I guess I shall show off a little.
23.23: Yura is the best? Really? Hurray!
23.20: It will take more than this to sink me...
23.21: Not yet... I won't sink from just this!
23.22: I guess this is better... than being scuttled...

23.EarlySummer 6547: Admiral. You can really feel the summer when the rainy season ends, can't you? I would like to get... a new swimsuit, too.
23.Summer 6547: Admiral, it's summer, right? Right! Ah... Yuudachi-chan. Your swimsuit is cute. Mine will be next year, too.
23.NotFall 6547: Fall, huh? ...The further we go into fall, for some reason, I... start to feel a little more lonely, you know...
23.6547: Admiral, the season is... fall, you know? Hey... would you mind going with me... to the naval base's Fall Festival this year?
23.1471: Admiral, that handbag... is very nice. It's really lovely. I wish I had one, too...

54.1: Sendai has arrived. Please leave the night battle to me.
54.25: I am the culmination of the 5500-ton light cruisers, the Sendai-class. I'll fully teach you the appeal of a mature light cruiser. Of course, it'll be with a night battle!
54.3: Nighttime is great, isn't it? Yup.
54.4: Come on, don't be so impatient. The night is long, you know?
54.29: Hm? I-It's not like I'm getting bored or anything, because I'm not! Really!
54.28: Admiral, thanks for the hard work. You're tired from the constant night battles, right? Yeah, I understand!
54.24: Admiral, what's up? You're all red... O~ho, you wanna have a night battle with me?
54.8: It looks like there's a letter for Admiral!
54.9: You're going to make me stronger? Thanks!
54.10: With this, I can go hard at night battles again.
54.27: You're going to make me stronger? Thanks!
54.11: Morning, huh... I'm going to rest for a little while.
54.12: As expected, I'm dead tired... I'll just head into the docks for a bit, okay?
54.7: The fleet has returned. I wonder how the results are?
54.14: You must night battle, okay? Promise?
54.23: This is the expected outcome. It's fine, it's fine. You don't need to praise me so much.
54.22: I wanted to... go wild... at night some more....
54.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, today's a special day, isn't it? Right? On a day like this, we should night battle! Yeah, let's night battle!
54.Rainy 6547: The rainy season, huh. It damages the equipment, so I don't really like it. But it doesn't matter! Rain or no rain doesn't mean much for night battles, anyway!
54.Summer 6547: Summertime! Hurray! The season for night battles! Admiral, let's do some night battles! Hurry and start a night-bat-tle!

55.1: Um... I'm light cruiser Jintsuu... how... nice to meet you...
55.25: I'm Jintsuu. I received an upgrade and was assigned as the flagship of the Second Torpedo Squadron. I fought bravely as the vanguard in the Battle of Kolombangara Island. But... everybody... focused their fire on me... how cruel...
55.4: Um... Admiral... touching me like that... you're confusing me...
55.28: Admiral, aren't you tired? When you get a chance to rest, please do so, okay?
55.24: Every now and then, would it be okay to have a relaxing chat with you? ...Eh? Really? It's fine?
55.8: Admiral, there is a letter here for you.
55.9: What's going on... my body... I'm feeling flushed...
55.10: Such a wonderful upgrade. I'm... overjoyed...!
55.27: What's going on... my body... I'm feeling flushed...
55.11: Umm... just for a bit, allow me to rest.
55.12: I was defeated... I'm going to focus on repairs for a while. Please excuse me.
55.6: Uhm... it looks like repairs have been finished...
55.7: Our fleet has returned from the sortie.
55.14: I'm not sure if I'll be of much use, but I'm heading out!
55.18: You've let down your guard. I am now loaded for bear.
55.23: To be able to do something like this for the admiral... I'm truly happy.
55.21: Nh... I've been hit. It's.. getting hard to fight...
55.22: Admiral... I... together with you... it was an honor...
55.Rainy 6547: The rainy season.... the sound of rain.... it makes for a really calm feeling. Admiral, it's quiet today, isn't it?
55.6547: Admiral... a yukata... you mean? Ah, yes. I did bring it along, but... Watch the fireworks together? Ah... with pleasure...

56.1: The fleet's idol, Naka-chan!Nice to meet you!
56.25: Selected as the Centre of DesRon 4, it's Naka-chan! Doing lots of work, from guarding transports to doing the Tokyo Express from Truk... Eh? Was it a Provincial tour, you ask? That is SO not what I was doing!
56.4: Naka-chan belongs to everyone, so don't touch her too much, okay?
56.29: Hrm. The next job's location.. wha, today's an off day... I see...
56.24: Thank you for all the support! I'm gonna work really, really hard for the admiral! Kira~n☆
56.8: You've got a call from work, Admiral!
56.10: I've become more and more charming! Kyaha~
56.27: Craft service, yeah? Time to ea~t!
56.11: Don't look at the backstage, okay?
56.12: I will be off for a while~! Good night.
56.5: A new shipdaughter has came~ I can't wait to see her~
56.7: Job is done! Thanks for your hard work!
56.14: Naka-chan is sortieing to the scene~
56.15: My skin gets all rough on location~
56.18: Naka-chan's the centre! The number one highlight!
56.23: Even if the game is boring, please don't hate Naka-chan!
56.20: It hurts! I told you, it hurts!
56.21: Even if it is so, Naka-chan will not swerve from her path!
56.22: Eh? Naka is sinking? Sinking... is not a setting an idol should be in...
56.Rainy 6547: Even during the rainy season, Naka-chan is the center! Of course, Naka-chan's teru teru bozu is also the center!
56.Summer 6547: It's summer! Summer! The time for Naka-chan's summer live concert is here! Alright, I'm gonna perform! Costume, costume~

102.1: I'm Chitose. I'm the the first Japanese seaplane tender. Nice to meet you!
102.25: I'm the Seaplane Tender, Chitose. Although I'm an exceptional ship capable of making use of seaplanes a lot, I was used as an oiler and supplied fuel to other ships. In the latter stages of the war, I was remodeled into an aircraft carrier and fought in the frontline.
102.2: Admiral, what do you want to drink?
102.3: You want some more? Here you go!
102.4: Admiral~ you can really knock them back! Here, another drink!
102.29: You're busy aren't you? That's fine, that's fine. How about we take it easy?
102.28: Admiral, it's not good to work yourself too hard. Once in a while, won't you drink some fine sake with me, and have a little rest? Alright...?
102.24: Admiral, after the battle's over, why don't we have a drink together? Ah, not some fuel!
102.8: Admiral, there's a message for you.
102.13: No problem, leave it to me.
102.10: Ah, fix it right there. Yeah, there. I want to be more useful.
102.11: With only this much... I'll be better soon.
102.12: Since Chiyoda will worry about me, I'll heal up as fast as possible.
102.5: Umm, it looks like a new ship has arrived.
102.15: I'm proud of my newly developed E12 seaplanes!
102.23: No need to thank me, it's all thanks to the seaplanes...
102.Rainy 6547: The rainy season. The number of clear days are decreasing... but on these days, having a light drink in the room sounds good, doesn't it? Ufu~
102.Summer 6547: Chiyoda, it's getting hot little by little. Summer is on the way.
102.NotFall 6547: Summer is already over, and the fall has arrived.
102.NotFall 1471: That's right. In fall, drinking sake while eating makes it taste even better.
102.NotFall 4: Chiyoda, baked sweet potatoes are delicious, but don't eat too much or you'll get fat. Look, the admiral can see you!

20.1: The eighth ship of Kagerou-class destroyer, I'm Yukikaze. I'll be in your care!
20.25: I'm Yukikaze, eighth ship of the Kagerou-class destroyer. Among the destroyers of the main fleet, while taking part in over 10 major naval battles, I'm the only one to have survived the war with barely any damage. Miracle destroyer? Nope, it was no miracle!
20.4: Um, do you have any business with Yukikaze?
20.24: The miracle destroyer... no, that's not it. It's only because I always wanna stay by the commander... Oh, wait, I mean, t-that's not it either!
20.9: I can feel the kiss of the fortune goddess!
20.27: I can feel the kiss of the fortune goddess!
20.12: Repairing so I can rejoin operations!
20.6: The docked ship has finished repairs!
20.5: A new comrade has been launched!
20.23: Yukikaze, came back alive as always! Thanks, Commander.
20.19: The "unsinkable" title is not only for show!!
20.21: Uhh, but, I- I won't sink, okay.
20.22: The unsinkable ship...does not exist in this world.
20.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, it's a memorial day. Congratulations, Yukikaze is happy, too.
20.Rainy 6547: Commander! There are a lot of rainy days recently. It's quite annoying since our uniforms and laundry won't dry as well, right?

103.1: Seaplane tender Chiyoda. My older sister Chitose isn't bothering you, is she?
103.25: Laid down as a Seaplane Tender, second of the Chitose class, Chiyoda. I was able to make use of midget subs, you know. I'll do my best alongside Chitose-onee!
103.2: Eh? Did Chitose-onee do something again?
103.3: Chitose-onee... watch out... ah... A dream?
103.4: Chitose-onee.. that tickleeeesss... oh, Admiral, What are you doing?
103.29: Admiral, it's Chiyoda! Did you forget about me?
103.28: Admiral, had you not seen Chitose-onee around here? Ah, is that so, hmm... well, then, umm... you look a little worn-out so I'll lend you my lap! I'll let you rest a little!
103.24: Admiral, do you need something? Ah- You wanted to know if I'd seen Chitose-onee? I see...
103.8: Communique for Chitose-onee... no, for the admiral.
103.9: I'm getting a bit closer to Chitose-onee, aren't I?
103.10: Heheh I can win with this... Maybe even beat Chitose-onee!
103.27: I'm getting a bit closer to Chitose-onee, aren't I?
103.11: I'm not really fond of docking, actually...
103.12: Urgh... I'm going for heavy repairs...? Don't tell Chitose-onee! I beg you!
103.6: I heard the the damaged ship has been repaired.
103.5: A new ship has been finished~ Oh, here she comes~
103.7: The fleet has returned. Is everybody safe?
103.15: This is Chiyoda's seaplane. I've spotted the enemy!
103.23: Chiyoda's the best? Oh my, am I as good as Sis?
103.20: I'm not going the same way as Chitose-onee!
103.21: No... At this rate, my seaplanes...
103.Rainy 6547: Rainy days are a little boring... Chitose-onee... I wonder what she's up to. Ah, I'm off to see her for a bit!
103.Summer 6547: Chitose-onee, it's getting so hot. It's almost summer. Onee, aren't you going to buy a swimsuit?
103.NotFall 6547: Chitose-onee, let's make baked sweet potatoes! Fall is a time for baking sweet potatoes. I'll go get some potatoes!
103.NotFall 1471: *nom* These baked sweet potatoes are delicious♪
103.NotFall 4: Mmmm... so sweet... these potatoes are really delicious. Chitose-onee, you're not having any?

70.1: I'm Mogami. It's alright, I won't collide with anyone this time. Really!

70.29: Admiral! Oh, you're busy? I'm going out for some workout.
70.28: I'm always crashing because I've only got eyes for you, Admiral! Just kidding!
70.24: Ah, Admiral? Somehow, my rear cannon feels a bit off. Hey, could you take a quick look? Yeah, that's the spot…hey, that's not it!
70.12: Dang, my stern cannons got damaged a little bit.
70.6: Looks like the repairs are done.
70.15: Hey, is it okay to start now?
70.18: I'd better not have a collision...
70.23: I'm number one? Hmm, yeah... to be frank, I'm happy, thanks!
70.21: Argh! This'll make it hard to keep going on...
70.22: I'm sinking too... was it inevitable?...

70.33: 0300. *yawn* Eh? You're still working in this late time? Thank you for your work!
70.34: 0400. *big yawn* Man, Admiral sure works hard.
70.35: 0500. Huh? Ah, I was dreaming a bit just now.

70.37: 0700. Is it OK if I sleep now?

70.40: 1000. Your eyes are wide open when you're bustling.
70.42: 1200. Admiral, let's fill up at lunch, okay?
70.43: 1300. I'm stuffed! Dessert goes in a different stomach, though.
70.44: 1400. Mmm, Mamiya's ice cream is delicious! Admiral, you got cream on your face... Yep, there you go!
70.45: 1500. If the meal comes with dessert, I guess I can do the night shift.
70.46: 1600. I managed to eat a lot, but I'm sleepy now.
70.47: 1700. I'm so tired, I feel like I can sleep while walking...Oh, sorry!

70.49: 1900. The admiral carried me here!? I'm really sorry!

70.Rainy 6547: Mikuma, what's wrong? You don't look too great there. Ah I know, shall we invite Suzuya and Kumano and have a tea party or something? 'Kay?
70.Rainy 1471: Admiral, hold still for a bit. See? Wearing your hat this way is cooler!
70.Summer 6547: Mikuma, what's wrong? Why the long face? Ah, I know! How about we get some ramune? My treat.
70.6547: So it's fall, huh? Ah, Michishio. This season... doesn't it make you a feel a little tightness in your chest? I wonder why that is.

59.1: I'm Furutaka. I'll be happy to show how all the good points of heavy cruisers.
59.25: Heavy cruiser, Furutaka. Selected by Vice Admiral Mikawa to be a member of the eighth fleet, I took out a lot of enemies at the first Battle of Solomon! This is what a heavy cruiser can do!
59.2: This is a really great unit, you know?
59.3: The next operation area's data, is it okay to show me?
59.29: The admiral's, busy... uh... what to do...? I wonder what's Kako doing?... Admiral, what should Furutaka do!?
59.24: Admiral! How was the Heavy Cruiser team's performance? Did we make a difference? Awright, that's great! I'm so happy!
59.8: Looks like there's a notice for you, Admiral.
59.9: With this night battles will be a cinch!
59.10: With Team Mikawa's comrades, I can boast.
59.27: Night battle will be easy with this.
59.11: My weapons need some repairs, yeah?
59.12: That last battle, I overdid it a bit, yeah?
59.6: Seems like repairs have been completed.
59.5: A new ship has been constructed.
59.14: Seize the enemy transport ships. Want to defeat them, right?
59.18: I'm pretty good at night battles, you know!
59.23: We only stood out by chance. That's what being a heavy cruiser is about.
59.21: Ah, they got me... I'm not sunk yet!
59.Anniversary 6547: Today is a wonderful day, Admiral! Furutaka is honored to be with you! Thanks as always!
59.EarlySummer 6547: Summer is really coming along this year, isn't it? I wonder where a good place would be to buy a new swimsuit with Kako.
59.6547: At this time of year, the naval base calms a bit down and the atmosphere is a little laid back, isn't it? Fall kinda gets me into a strange mood.

60.1: Second Furutaka Class Heavy Cruiser, name's Kako! Nice to meetcha!
60.25: I'm the Second Furutaka Class Heavy Cruiser, Kako. I achieved quite a feat during the Battle of Savo Islands! Ah, the way back? Well, the verse "Going in is easy, but returning is scary" was no joke!
60.3: Strategy meeting? I'll just ask Furutaka about it later, can I not do that?
60.4: Yeah, yeah! I hear ya! Now stop pulling my skirt!
60.29: Zzzzzzz... Zzzzzz... Zzzzzzz... Zzzzzz... Zzzz... Nya... mfufufu. Whoa! I'm not sleeping! I was awake, I was.
60.24: Aaaahhhh, another scolding, yeah? Sorry for my carelessness, yeah? Wha- that's not it? Admiral… why is your face red?
60.8: A letter for the admiral... I'm awake, I'm awake!
60.9: Woah, I'm wide awake now. I can feel the energy from this!
60.10: Somehow, I feel cooler now, hehe
60.27: Whoa, I feel awake. The power is surging!
60.11: Stop it...so sluggish...the fitting...ah, forget it...
60.12: Aah, I'm seriously gonna die...let me pass out in bed!
60.5: Got a report that a new ship is do~ne.
60.7: The sortie's done, here's the report... *snore*
60.14: Kako, ready to sortie! Furutaka, you're coming too.
60.23: See, I can really do it if I try! So, when I get back, let me sleep a bunch!
60.19: Damn, and we were just about to leave!
60.20: The gun battery has blown off!?
60.21: Youuu! You perverted son of a bitch!
60.22: Yeah, Furutaka always scolded me for getting carried away too much...
60.Anniversary 6547: To be able to spend such a day with the admiral— I'm happy!
60.EarlySummer 6547: Finally, it's gotten hot out, hasn't it? Summer is coming, isn't it? Ehehehe. That's great. Summer. Awesome!
60.Summer 6547: Great! Summer has arrived! Alright, I'm gonna take lots of naps! Ehh... I can't?

61.1: Hi, thanks for your time, I'm Aoba! Please can I have some words!
61.25: I'm Aoba. Advancing into the Truk Islands area, I supported the Pacific Front. With a war correspondent on board, the staff also had reporting as part of their job. At my last moment, I was at Kure. Even without fuel, I did my best!
61.4: Are you interested? I've got some good news, you know?
61.24: Aoba, all she really wants to do is look at the commander rather than the enemy… J-just kidding!
61.8: Some news? What is it, what is iiiit?
61.9: Okay! I can work better now!
61.10: This'll let me do so much more reporting... ah, no, make fighting easer.
61.27: Okay! I can work better now!
61.12: I seem to have gotten too deeply in the matter.
61.6: It looks like someone's repairs are completed♪
61.5: According to the data, there seems to be a new ship launching, yeah?
61.7: The fleet's back, could I have an interview?
61.16: The enemy still hasn't noticed us!
61.17: Searching, barrages, torpedoes - leave them all to me!
61.23: Happy to be of service, thanks again.
61.21: Firepower... Is firepower just not enough, I wonder...
61.22: Sunk, huh... I wanted to sink at Kure....
61.Rainy 6547: Oh, Gassa! That dejected expression of yours looks nice. Yoink! Huh? Hey, give me my camera back! Why are you taking pics of me!? Ones of me are no good!
61.EarlySummer 6547: It's getting hotter and hotter. So summer is coming back for the year. This season reminds me a little of the last summer at Kure.
61.Summer 6547: Oh...! It's the middle of summer! So many ship girls are out wearing fashionable swimsuits...! Great, huh? How flashy! Eh, 'Gasa? Ah, I should, too? No, I'm good...!
61.6547: Somehow it's fall already, isn't it~ Fall is the season for tasty food. Well, isn't that great~

62.1: I am Myoukou, of the Myoukou-class Heavy Cruisers. Let us work on this together.
62.25: A heavy cruiser built under the auspices of the Washington Naval Treaty. I'm a first-class warship of the Japanese Navy designed by Yuzuru Hiraga. This name has also been passed on to Aegis destroyers of the modern MSDF.
62.2: Admiral. Did you call for me?
62.3: Is there... something I can help you with?
62.4: If its something difficult to say, shall we talk over there?
62.29: The admiral seems very busy... In that case, I should do everything I can at hand, so that the admiral may call on me whenever I'm needed.
62.28: If the admiral falls, I...please at least rest a bit when you are tired. It is Myoukou's wish.
62.24: I greatly respect the admiral's fabulous strategy and tactics, and always shall.
62.8: It looks like there is a message for you from Command.
62.9: Looks like I'm getting even more stronger.
62.10: Oh my. I'm getting stronger and stronger. What should I do?
62.27: Looks like I'm getting even more stronger.
62.12: Are you sure that someone like myself would be allowed to rest?
62.5: Oh, I'll go greet our new addition.
62.7: The fleet has returned. With wonderful results!
62.14: We must not stand down from this battle!
62.18: Then there's no other choice... Moving to pursue!
62.23: It's all thanks to everyone's hard work. Do commend them, would you please?
62.21: What else... can I possibly do...?
62.22: See you... in another life... good bye.
62.30: 0000 hours at night. It's already this late. The day goes fast, doesn't it Admiral?
62.31: 0100 hours. Admiral, pushing yourself too hard might be tough on your health.
62.32: 0200 hours. This Myoukou will look over the remainder, okay? Admi-... Oh...
62.33: 0300 hours. No, I was just taken by surprise when you put the blanket over me.
62.34: 0400 hours. Admiral, what should I do with this? Oh? Admiral, are you sleeping?
62.35: 0500 hours. I better take care of everything while the admiral's asleep.
62.36: 0600 hours. Hngh... It's morning. The admiral's job certainly is a tough one. Oh, a visitor?
62.37: 0700 hours. Coming! Oh, Ashigara, what's wrong? You look surprised?
62.38: 0800 ho-... Ah, good morning. Ashigara was here just... Admiral? You don't look so good.
62.39: 0900 hours. (Sigh) ...Admiral? You forgot your appointment with Ashigara for a discussion over breakfast, didn't you.
62.40: 1000 hours. Goodness. I'll make sure to apologize to her in your stead. By the way, about this document...
62.41: 1100 hours. Yes, I suppose we'll have an early lunch while we work.
62.42: 1200 hou- Oh... another visitor? Come in! Eh-... Haguro? Why are you so teary?! Ah, don't leave!
62.43: 1300 hours. Admiral, I see why you're so troubled... Very well. We'll chat after our work.
62.44: 1400 hours. Admiral, I don't mean to scold, but can we talk for a minute?
62.45: 1500 hours. Admiral, we'll leave out the fact that you're forgetful. But promises are things that are meant to be kept.
62.46: 1600 hours. All the girls look forward to seeing you. And forgetting that is... Are you listening to me!
62.47: 1700 hours. Now you have plans for dinner with someone as well, don't you?
62.48: 1800 hours. Wha-... You want me to make curry tonight? Okay... Very well.
62.49: 1900 hours. Here's Myoukou's Special Curry. The meat has been glazed with brandy, and...
62.50: 2000 hours. Well then, I'll go patrol the base perimeters. ...Admiral?
62.51: 2100 hours. I suppose all the Kanmusus love the admiral anyway. (Giggle)
62.52: 2200 hours. Everything is quiet on the base! Oh. Nachi? Where are you going with that bottle of sake?
62.53: 2300 hours. Hmm? You had plans to drink with the admiral? (Sigh) Goodness... Admiral, you are unbelievable...
62.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, I would like to show my appreciation for your spending time with I, Myoukou, on this important occasion.
62.Rainy 6547: The wet time of year— the rainy season. Even the sound of raindrops... when you close your eyes and listen.... it calms the mind, don't you think?
62.Summer 6547: It has gotten quite hot. It must be summer. Ah, Takao! You're cheerful as always. Eh? A swimsuit, you say?
62.6547: Autumn. In some respects, it's a lonely season. Still, it's perfect for reading, isn't it? Admiral, what will you be reading?

63.1: You are my commander? I'm Nachi. I appreciate your contribution.
63.25: Born at the Kure Naval Yards. I am the second of the Myoukou Heavy Cruisers, who was the guardian of Shanghai. I was rushed out to the Pacific front as a flagship of the fifth fleet. Carrier-based planes? Ah, I'm a bit bad with those.
63.3: What? Do you have a plan?
63.4: Hmm? What's that you're doing? What kind of tactic is that?
63.29: No, I'm not bored. In fact i'm enjoying myself looking at what you're doing.
63.28: You, how are you doing? ...I see, it relieves me. We can sortie more together!
63.24: Hey you… Somehow… I don’t hate you…. Yeah, as long as I am with you, I can promise more great victories. Definitely.
63.10: Hmm, where did you get the blueprints for this remodeling?
63.11: Looks like I won't be appearing on the front lines for now, huh.
63.12: Apologies, but let me rest. Recess is part of a battle too.
63.6: Looks like the repairs have been completed. Do you wish to check on it?
63.5: Looks like a new ship has been launched. Looking forward to it.
63.7: The report for the battle results is in. Want to hear about it?
63.14: Let's go! Those who afraid just stay where you are!
63.16: Enemy to starboard! Take aim carefully!
63.18: We will avenge our friends! Pursue them!
63.17: One more time... This will be the critical hit!
63.23: I can't be getting all excited about this victory now.. we can't let our guard down yet. Nonetheless, tonight let's drink the night away!
63.21: A wound like this... It's nothing...
63.22: This is my end, huh... That's acceptable... Fare... thee... well...
63.Anniversary 6547: Ah, that's right. Today is a special day. Then I shall drink the night away. Of course, with you.
63.Summer 6547: Summer, huh? It's a bit hot, but it isn't unbearable. Well, why don't we open a bottle to rid ourselves of the heat!
63.6547: When this season comes around, for some reason, I start to get a little lonely. That's so unlike me, huh?

64.1: I'm Ashigara. My specialty is surface combat. Nice to meet you.
64.25: I am the Ashigara that participated in the English fleet review, you know. I was acknowledged as the 'Hungry Wolf'. But of course! With this fearless body! Eh? That's got nothing to do with my sex appeal? And wasn't even a praise? There's... no way that's right!
64.2: What is it? Did something happen?
64.3: What? Is it time for a sortie?
64.4: P-Please don't touch me. I can take care of my own equipment.
64.29: When do I deploy!? Tell me, when and where do I deploy to!? Combat, battle, VICTORY IS CALLING TO ME!
64.28: Are you alright? Don't overdo yourself, kay? Whether it's an encounter or a battle, the beginning is the most crucial after all! Let's always face them in the best condition!
64.24: To truly pull out my full strength… You are… you're the first to do so!
64.8: You have a message. I wonder what it is...
64.13: It's time for a sortie! Battle... VICTORY is calling for me!
64.9: I love it when I feel myself getting stronger!
64.10: Amazing! I can feel the power! Hey, I can fire a test shot right?!
64.27: I love it when I feel myself getting stronger!
64.11: Does my fighting style make you nervous?
64.12: Well, it takes good rest too for the sake of victory. Alright, I'll take a break!
64.6: Just saying that a ship has finished repairing.
64.5: We've got a new companion. Let's go meet her.
64.7: It looks like a fleet has returned from an operation.
64.14: Ashigara, reporting for duty! Look forward to a victory report!
64.15: Top speed! Prepare the cannons! Fire!
64.18: Time for round two. All ships, charge!
64.17: My ten cannons aren't just for show!
64.23: Ah, it's natural consequence with me, Ashigara! A great victory!
64.21: Shit! I can't believe I've taken this much damage...
64.22: Damn, the victory was my only pride...
64.30: Midnight, the date has changed. And now, the true start of the Naval Base begins!
64.31: 0100. In the depths of night, the senses are sharper. It's the best...
64.32: 0200. Alright! Image Training for Victory! Good ni~ght!
64.33: 0300. Zzz.... Ha! It's dangerous, Admiral! I'll... Zzz...
64.34: 0400..brgl... I can take on all you guys by myself... you're all bark and no bite...zzz
64.35: 0500. mrgl...Is there...nobody with more backbone... This Ashigara-sama will...zzz
64.36: 0600. Wa-Wha!? The admiral's gone!? Admiral, where are you?? Maybe in the next room?
64.37: 0700. Whoa, you surprised me. Admiral! Why are you with Myouko!?
64.38: 0800. I'm surprisingly hungry. Mamiya-san, a Victory set plea~se!
64.39: 0900. Admiral, of course the breakfast set has to be Mamiya's, right! S~o De~lish!
64.40: 1000. About time to sortie for Victory! Let's go, Heavy Cruiser Team!
64.41: 1100. Heavy Cruisers are certainly awesome...this wolf-like motion. Right!?
64.42: 1200. Admiral, lunch is a katsu sandwich. Of course, Victory! I'll shoulder the omen!
64.43: 1300. In the afternoon too, let's all sally forth towards a win! Let's Go Victory!
64.44: 1400! Training is just not enough, huh...I've got to get even stronger, like Myouko-neesan!
64.45: 1500. Myouko-neesan is so strong. She doesn’t look like it at first glance, but on the contrary, she's scary...
64.46: 1 600. Moreover... One time, when she got fired up, her lecture just went on and on! Eh? You knew?
64.47: 1700. It's about the time that everybody in the long expedition returns, yeah? I wonder what the result will be?
64.48: 1800. Well then, the secretary ship, this Ashigara-sama, shall prepare some celebratory Victory Curry!
64.49: 1900. Okay! Bring on the oil! I'll fry them one-by-one!
64.50: 2000.More than one hundred katsu...how appealing... Alright! Bring it on!
64.51: 2100. Eehhh! My katsu curry caused heartburn! H-how did this happen!?
64.52: 2200. Admiral, I don't need comforting or anything.... How strange... Why is that bad?
64.53: 2300. A~lright! Feeling-swap complete! I'll do my best in tonight's Battle Image Training too!
64.Anniversary 6547: Oh my, today is an important occasion for us. And it's a good day to deep fry some Katsus. Right?
64.Summer 6547: Summer is on the way, isn't it? I have a good feeling. This is my year!
64.6547: Fall is a lonely season. Alright! At times like this, we need the victory cutlet curry! Alriight! I'll make some!

65.1: I'm Haguro. I'm the youngest of the Myoukou-class heavy cruiser sisters. U-um... I'm sorry!
65.25: I was born in Nagasaki. I participated in many battles, in the Battle of the Java Sea, the Battle of the Coral Sea, the Battle of Midway, the Battle of the Eastern Solomons, and the Battle of the Philippine Sea. Um... I try my best!
65.4: Um... excuse me... Is this some new way of communication?
65.29: E, excuse me, Commander…? Haguro is waiting for you here in case of trouble...
65.28: Commander… I hope this war will be over and the sea will get quiet. I pray for it. Commander… you will surely…
65.24: After this battle is over… T-together with the commander..! Erm.. Ummm.. Errrmm…
65.13: Picking even me... I'll try my absolute best!
65.9: I... don't need to receive this kind of strength...
65.10: Um... could you remodel the others too?
65.27: I... don't need to receive this kind of strength...
65.11: The other girls (ships) should go first.
65.12: Okay. Any more and I would have sunk instantly back there.
65.6: Um... The ship repair.. has been finished.
65.5: It seems a new comrade has been launched.
65.7: The battle is complete... Um... Just reporting...
65.16: Guns and torpedoes engaged, I hope this is enough...
65.23: As it is, it would be better if all the fighting could end.
65.22: The other girls (ships), could they manage to hold on... Ah, no more, I can't see any more...
65.Anniversary 6547: C-Commander, sir... today is anniversary day, right? I am so happy... Happy indeed. Yes.
65.Summer 6547: It's summer, isn't it? ...Huh? "Aren't you going to swim," you asked? Well, I don't have a swimsuit... u-um... eh... ehhhh?!
65.6547: Fall is... so peaceful, isn't it? I really enjoy this season. Commander, what about you?

66.1: Good morning. I'm Takao. It's great that you look like an excellent Admiral.
66.25: If you're talking about cruisers, no matter how you look at it, it has to be me, Takao! Attached to Vice Admiral Kondo's fourth fleet, I participated in many naval battles. Overcoming these hard-fought conflicts, I concluded with a diligent defence of Singapore.
66.2: Please, you can ask me anything.
66.3: Is there something on your mind?
66.4: Um, oh, what should I do?
66.29: Alright, the preparations for the sortie are done... after that, I wonder if Atago is doing fine... Oh, Admiral? Ufu~... That's fine...
66.28: Admiral, Takao will be with you... have no fear.
66.24: These words of praise... I would like to have that in a more direct way... no, not a medal, but instead...
66.9: Somehow, to be liberated like this... what a great feeling.
66.10: This power is all thanks to the admiral.
66.27: Somehow, to be liberated like this... what a great feeling.
66.11: Let's watch over those children from here.
66.12: Total recumbence... even though I can still fight...
66.6: It seems like repairs are complete!
66.5: A new comrade. Let's give them a warm welcome!
66.7: Operation complete! The fleet has returned!
66.23: Admiral, did you watch my performance?
66.21: W-what! Did you think you'd win with that!?
66.22: I am... sinking, huh... Good bye... Admiral...
66.Rainy 6547: It's been raining a lot lately, hasn't it? I tell you, this surely is the rainy season! Ah, I-I'm sorry.
66.EarlySummer 6547: Hgnnn... Summer is coming soon. Eh? Ah, well, maybe for a bit, I'll go on a diet. Hgnnn...
66.Summer 6547: Atago, why are you so underdressed? Even in summer, you have to dress properly. Look, even the admiral is wearing his commander uniform properly... properly... Ahh... um... Admiral?
66.6547: Fall! Fall is the time of year when the Fourth Squadron can't afford to get careless. Everyone, stay vigilant! In particular, your fall... appetites...

83.1: I'm the aircraft carrier, Akagi. If you're forming a carrier task force, just leave it to me.
83.25: I'm the aircraft carrier, Akagi. As a mainstay of the Carrier Task Force, I support its forward advances. A combination of diligent training and many proud air wings has earned us a reputation as an "invincible fleet". Overconfident, you say...? Hmm... you may be right... I'll keep it in mind.
83.2: Are we holding a strategy meeting?
83.3: Reppuu? No, never heard of it.
83.4: Ryuusei? Is that different from the Type 97 Torpedo Bomber?
83.29: Um... Admiral? Is it mealti- no! Is it time to start the strategy meeting yet?!
83.28: First Division, Akagi, always ready to deploy! Admiral, please take a break sometime.
83.24: Admiral... Admiral, when I'm with you, I feel as though there is a way to change those fateful five minutes. I will do my best.
83.8: Admiral, I have a message for you.
83.13: We mustn't be overconfident. Let's move forward with all our might!
83.9: I guess having three flight decks... is unnecessary, huh?
83.10: Thank you very much for the modernization.
83.27: Thank you very much for resupplying my planes. It helps a lot.
83.11: I'll be preparing for the next operation.
83.12: Looks like it'll take a little while to repair the flight deck.
83.5: A new ship can now take part in the task force.
83.15: First attack squadron, please launch now!
83.18: Second attack squadron, launch all planes!
83.17: All carrier-based planes, are you ready?
83.23: We must not become complacent following this victory. Reconnaissance and gaining the initiative are key... wait... where did that come from?
83.21: The pride of the First Division... I cannot fall in such a place...
83.22: I'm so sorry... scuttle me... please do it...
83.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, today is an important day to us CarDiv 1. Here's to another year working together with you.
83.Rainy 6547: It's the rainy season. It's raining again today.... On a day like this, taking a break at Mamiya's sounds nice. Right, Admiral? Admiral?
83.Summer 6547: Oh my, Kaga-san. Summer is coming. Eh? A new swimsuit? I hadn't thought about getting one...
83.6547: Admiral, it's the autumn season. Autumn is for appetites. There are so many kinds of delicious food at this time of year... I can't wait♪

67.1: I'm Atago. Admiral, please remember that, okay?
67.25: Second of the Takao-class, Atago. Ufufu! I was born at the Kure Naval Arsenal. Don't I have a well-balanced and heavily armed body? At the decisive Battle of Leyte Gulf, I deployed as the flagship of the Central Force... Well, things happened, you know?
67.4: Oh, you. You're just like a baby on the inside, aren't you?
67.29: Admiral? Well, now... it looks like Takao might be running a little low on calcium. I wonder if she should drink more milk. A-ouch! Hey... Takao!
67.24: As a reward... for a little while, you and I can swap hats... and see how we look. *swap* Ufufufu♪
67.10: My upgrade is all done...! Huh? No, I didn't upgrade these. I've always had them!
67.11: I'm just going to take a quick break, okay?
67.12: My tanks are so big. They make my shoulders stiff, you know?
67.5: My, my. Looks like our circle of friends has grown!
67.15: Lots of enemies found! Commence attack, ok?
67.18: A night battle... this is my specialty!
67.23: Do you understand what I'm capable of now?
67.22: My, my... what a shame... I wonder if Takao is taking this seriously...
67.Rainy 6547: Such a downpour. This is the perfect time for hot milk. No, really. Want to try some?
67.EarlySummer 6547: Oh, my, Takao. You started dieting for the summer? It must be hard. Me? I don't need to.
67.Summer 6547: This summer is as hot as always~ When it's this hot, I'll be more comfortable doing my job if I dress down some, right? Uu... uwa~h! Much better~♪
67.6547: Fall is... let's see... I also get a little sad around now, you know... But! It's a time of year with really tasty food, you know.

68.1: Yo! Name's Maya, nice to meet you.
68.25: Third of the Takao-class heavy cruisers, Maya-sama! Kobe-built. I went hard in the Southern Ops and Solomon battles! Haah? Leyte? Nah, I'm not great with subs.
68.29: Hey! Admiral! Are you listening? Hey! ...Damn, he won't listen. The hell!? Sheesh...
68.24: Thanks for always using my full power, man. This too... I thank...you.
68.9: Yeaaah! I'm fired up! Here I go!
68.27: Yeaaah! I'm fired up! Here I go!
68.11: Pulling me back, will the fleet be okay?
68.12: Using me until I'm like this... dammit!
68.5: I heard there's a newbie. Let's take care of her!
68.14: If you're afraid, just hide behind me.
68.16: Here comes my pain train, eat it!
68.18: Looks like you're getting on my nerves, bub.
68.23: Isn't it obvious? I'm Maya the Awesome, you know?
68.21: Don't joke with me! J...just wait and see!
68.22: Sinking...huh... I had such a simple life...
68.Rainy 6547: Lately it's been all damp and wet, huh. Would be cool if the weather would just clear up already. I wish!
68.Summer 6547: Alright! It's summer! Summer! It feels great, huh? Admiral, let's take off our clothes and go for a swim!
68.6547: Man, the summer I was looking forward to is over with. Now we're stuck with this gloomy season. Ah... achoo!

69.1: I am Choukai. My best regards.
69.25: Fourth of the Takao-class ships, Choukai. Deployed to Malaya, Solomon, Marianas and Leyte Gulf for many operations. My name is now given to a JSDF AEGIS-equipped escort vessel, fourth in its class.
69.2: Oh, Commander. Thanks for the good work.
69.3: Do you have anything for me yet?
69.4: Oh, this is mission as well?
69.29: I'm confident in night battle, but about the enemy airplanes... Well, I should act like Maya... Uhm... but, but...
69.28: I am always thankful towards you. Being with you, it is a honor.
69.24: If you're ever confused by the strategy, you can always come to me, you know. We'll analyze it, just the two of us.
69.10: This equipment... it feels pretty good!
69.12: As expected, looks like I overdid it a little.
69.6: Reporting the repair is complete. The ship reparation is concluded, that's a relief.
69.5: Newbie, huh? Is the commander interested too?

39.28: I wonder what kind of day today will be~

39.13: I have been waiting for it!

39.26: I wonder what day is today?

40.28: Even without sleep for 24 hours I'm okay.

40.10: Again, do you want to soil that hand?
40.26: Even without sleep for 24 hours I'm okay.

40.18: I've been waiting for this moment.
40.23: So, this is the miracle Kiska operation? What, I'm mistaken?
40.21: It hurts... but, I don't mind...
40.22: Wakaba. Is sunk. I... hate it.. a bit...

41.1: Fourth ship of the Hatsuharu class, Hatsushimo. Everyone, I'm very pleased to meet you!
41.25: Fourth of the Hatsuharu-class destroyers, Hatsushimo. I was in lots of hard battles like the Operation AL, the Battle of the Komandorski Islands, the occupation of Kiska, the Battle of the Philippine Sea, Operation Hoku-Go and Ten-Ichi-Gō! I really did my best!

41.29: Hamakaze...Yahagi too, I wonder if they're okay...ah! Admiral! I'm just fine. I would save you too!

41.12: With this, I'll be able to protect everyone again.

42.1: First ship of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers, 'Shiratsuyu'!. Yes, the first ship!
42.25: Developed after the Hatsuharu-class destroyer, Shiratsuyu-class, number one, I'm Shiratsuyu! Yeah, number one, the first ship! With lots of upgrades, I'm a true fleet destroyer, you know! Eh? 'Don't be in such a rush that you'll hit a tanker'? Don't worry about it!
42.4: A~dmiral, do you want to talk to me that much? Alri~ght, I'll stay with you 'till the end!
42.29: Admiral ! work a little harder ! aim to be number one !
42.28: I want the admiral to become everybody's number one~ Yeah! Today's a number one smile!
42.24: *laugh* Admiral, what a nice feeling. My number one favourite thing? It's a se~cret!
42.6: A ship has done repairing it seems.
42.7: The operation's over, the fleet's come back, yeah?
42.14: First ship of the Shiratsuyu class destroyers, Shiratsuyu, going out!
42.18: I'll be the first to continue the attack, bring it on!

42.Summer 12: Dah~ ...And that was my favorite swimsuit... unforgivable... straight to the baths I go!
42.NotFall 6547: Hmm, so it's fall. It's started to get a bit chilly out, hasn't it? But short sleeves are still fine!
42.6547: First to wear a yukata! How is it? Let's hurry to the Fall Festival and get the best spot to watch the fireworks, okay? Come on♪
42.1471: Festivals are pretty nice, you know. They're fun, you know. Commander, what's the most fun moment of the festival, in your opinion?

90.1: I'm the aircraft carrier, Souryuu. If you're making a carrier mobile fleet, you can count me in.
90.25: I'm the aircraft carrier, Souryuu. Starting from the attack on Pearl Harbor, the crucial battle that opened the war, I participated as an important frontline carrier. Eh? What? Midway? What's that? Is it tasty?
90.3: Well... um... the Type 99 Dive Bombers will stick out...
90.4: Excuse me, but you'll interrupt the landing drill if you shake the ship too much...

90.28: Admiral, can you spare some time go into town with me? There are things I'd like to get. Ah, not at all, not at all! I'll buy them myself. Really!

90.8: Admiral, there's a telegram for you.
90.13: My mobile fleet is now launching!
90.9: Thanks. With this, I won't lose to Hiryuu!

43.1: I'm Shigure, of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers. Nice to meet you.
43.25: I'm the second ship of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers, Shigure. I participated in the Battle of Leyte Gulf under the Nishimura Fleet, in the fateful rush through Surigao Strait. Fusou and Yamashiro were amazing... Even if everyone forgets, I'll always remember them...

43.29: Am I still supposed to be here...?

43.10: Oxygen torpedoes, huh... sure, I'll take them.
43.11: Thank you. I'll be going in, then.
43.12: I've troubled everyone... I'll make up for it. I promise.

44.24: Just the two of us, it's suprisingly fun, I think. Hey, the compatbility between us is good, yeah?

44.Rainy 6547: Teru teru bozu? Then... I'll try making one, 'kay? Look, you do this here and... it's done.

44.6547: Yup, yup! Fall has a lot of tasty food, so it's really hard to pick. I have to be careful about my bulge as well.

45.18: Hmm... should we poi a little bit more?

45.Rainy 6547: Hmm... rainy days tend to keep you at home, but... still, it feels like I can poi out now. Poi~
45.Summer 6547: It's gotten hotter poi by poi. Summer is coming this year, poi!
45.NotFall 6547: Fall kinda makes my tummy go poi... Is the food ready yet? Food♪ food♪
45.6547: Summer is over, poi! Fall is here, poi! Poi, poi, poi!

46.25: I'm Samidare. My friends Murasame, Yuudachi and Harusame, we made up DesDiv2. Oh yeah, during a transport mission, I crashed into Shiratsuyu... Really, I'm... sorry for being clumsy... But, I'll do my best!
46.2: Admiral, I'll do my very best!

95.11: Even minor damage can prove fatal in the wrong situation.
95.12: It'll be fine. I'll be ready in time for the next battle.

95.18: Closing in on the enemy. One shot, one kill!
95.23: I'm happy we completed the operation. This is the power of an Asashio-class Destroyer.

95.6547: Commander... summer has passed... fall is coming. Don't worry! Us Asashio-class destroyers will go all-out in fall as well! You don't have to worry one bit!

96.1: Destroyer Ooshio reporting in! A small body with large torpedoes! Leave it to me.
96.25: Second of the Asashio-class destroyers, Ooshio! After being sent to the frontlines, I mobilized to Guadalcanal for evacuation missions three times. I'll support you!

96.4: Yeah, yeah, that feeling! Let's get fired up!
96.28: Commander, how've you been? Have you become rich?

96.9: Hauuu~ being reinforced is so heartwarming.
96.10: Uoooo! I've been versioned up in a lot of ways!
96.27: Hauuu~ being reinforced is so heartwarming.
96.12: Uuahh... I lost. I really lost~...

96.14: Leave the torpedo warfare to me!

97.1: Michishio here. Why did I get assigned to such a fleet?
97.25: I'm a destroyer, Michishio. I and my sisters Asashio, Ooshio, and Arashio were somehow assigned to the eighth destroyer squadron. But, we were separated in the end. Finally I broke into Leyte, as a member of Nishimura fleet.
97.4: What is it? I don't get what you mean.
97.29: If we're going, then go. If we're not, then don't. Please do it properly! Geez...
97.28: Reeaaally! This squadron is really lukewarm huh? We're not playing friendly, you know! ...I'm also a friend you say...? I-It's not like I'm happy about it...

97.EarlySummer 6547: It's slowly getting hotter... it's almost summer... Eh? A swimsuit? Huh?! Of course I don't need one! What are you saying?!
97.Summer 6547: It's midsummer. Every day is so hot. Eh? I should wear a swimsuit... you said? Huh?! What are you talking about? Are you trying to get me killed?! Idiot!
97.6547: Fall... huh. This season is a little depressing. Huh? Say what, Commander? It's not like I wanted to be consoled or anything... I'm fine!

98.1: Oh, I haven't introduced myself yet, have I? My name is Arashio.
98.25: I'm the Kobe girl destroyer. Yes, I'm Arashio. My sisters and I worked hard in a lot of places. The only thing is, I really do dislike having my smokestack destroyed by bombers.

48.1: Arare... I won't say 'ncha-'... Look after me...

48.4: Please don't touch my torpedoes that much...

91.1: Aircraft carrier Hiryuu here. Leave the carrier battles to me. I can fight on against any and all adversity.
